casebody.data:
Michael P. LONG and Marie C. Long
v.
CURRITUCK COUNTY, North Carolina and Elizabeth Letendre No. 274P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 22, 2016 George B. Currin, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Long, Michael P., et al. Donald I. McRee, Jr., Currituck County Attorney, for Currituck County. Gregory E. Wills, Attorney at Law, Point Harbor, for Letendre, Elizabeth.

ORDER

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th of July 2016 by Respondent (Elizabeth Letendre) for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Dissolved by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of September 2016."

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Respondent (Elizabeth Letendre) on the 26th of July 2016 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of September 2016."

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 26th of July 2016 by Respondent (Elizabeth Letendre) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of September 2016."
